name: Planetary Data
description:
This is a WIP created for Procedural Generation Jam 2016! I am still actively working on this game and there are several parts that I still need to finish. In it's current state, however, it should be amusing to anyone who knows that finding habitable planets is no walk in the park.!

3/18/2017 - Uploaded version 2.5.6, which fixes a bug and add more information.

12/30/2016 - Uploaded version 2.5.5, which includes info page on Earth conditions for comparison and fixed a bug.

12/27/2016 - Added planet artwork generated using Unity and Unity Asset Store textures.

12/4/2016 - **Upload version 2.0. Added more player feedback and logic that eliminates unwanted planet types. Still needs more polishing**

11/14/2016 - **Added small bug fix after initial upload. There are still some impossible planets, though.**
